title: South Korea : e-commerce sales volume 2009 to 2018
yAxis: E-commerce sales volume in trillion Korean won
summary: The statistic depicts the manufacturers ( South ) sales of sporting goods equipment , fitness equipment , sales apparel , athletic footwear , and sales licensed merchandise in the trillion from 2009 to 2018 .
In 2018 , South sales amounted to about 113.73 trillion Korean .

Sporting goods manufacturers South sales - additional information South sales of sporting goods in the trillion reached 113.73 trillion Korean in 2018 , the highest figure to-date and a eight trillion dollar increase on the figure from 2014 .
gold: This timeline shows online shopping transaction volume in South Korea from 2009 to 2018.
In 2018 , the online shopping transactions totaled more than 113 trillion South Korean won , up from around 92 trillion won in the previous year .
